Subskills.name: Infernal Reach
Subskills.description: Increases the attack range of inferno slash.

Subskills.name: Scattering Flame
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using inferno slash.

Subskills.name: Infernal Cleave
Subskills.description: Inferno slash is now a 360 degree area of effect attack.

Subskills.name: Molten Ground
Subskills.description: Chance on striking to set the ground on fire.

Subskills.name: Stacked Burn
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to gain a stacking fire skill damage buff.

Subskills.name: Scorching Slash
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by inferno slash.

Subskills.name: Flies of Agony
Subskills.description: Inferno slash now sends burning fireflies towards monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Accelerated Fumes
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to gain increased attack speed.

Subskills.name: Igniting Wind
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to perform an additional attack.

Subskills.name: Third Degree Burns
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Searing Fork
Subskills.description: Inferno slash sends multiple smaller waves that split on the first hit.

Subskills.name: Fearful Flames
Subskills.description: Inferno slash now knocks back monsters inflicting Burning and dealing increased Damage.
